Posts.Content: Grandma-Diann wrote: I have been dealing with lymphadema of the arm  for over 6 mths.  Now all of a sudden my breast is swelling and extremely painful.  They have removed fluid 3 times.  Does anyone have any suggestions of how to bring down the swelling and lessen the pain? Dx 6/11/2011, 5cm, Stage II, Grade 3, 0/6 nodes, ER+, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Lymphadema Grandma-Diann Kicks
